trans-unit.resname: GNT·1 | Militant Angel | Card Text | Paragraph 1
GNT·1 | Militant Angel | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: When CARDNAME enters the battlefield, create a number of 2/2 white Knight creature tokens with vigilance equal to the number of opponents you attacked this turn.
trans-unit.target: When CARDNAME enters the battlefield, create a number of 2/2 white Knight creature tokens with vigilance equal to the number of opponents you attacked this turn.

trans-unit.resname: GNT·2 | Inspired Sphinx | Card Text | Paragraph 1
GNT·2 | Inspired Sphinx | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: When CARDNAME enters the battlefield, draw cards equal to the number of opponents you have.
trans-unit.target: When CARDNAME enters the battlefield, draw cards equal to the number of opponents you have.

trans-unit.resname: GNT·2 | Inspired Sphinx | Card Text | Paragraph 3
trans-unit.source: {3}{U}: Create a 1/1 colorless Thopter artifact creature token with flying.
trans-unit.target: {3}{U}: Create a 1/1 colorless Thopter artifact creature token with flying.

trans-unit.resname: GNT·3 | Rot Hulk | Card Text | Paragraph 1
GNT·3 | Rot Hulk | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: When CARDNAME enters the battlefield, return up to X target Zombie cards from your graveyard to the battlefield, where X is the number of opponents you have.
trans-unit.target: When CARDNAME enters the battlefield, return up to X target Zombie cards from your graveyard to the battlefield, where X is the number of opponents you have.

trans-unit.resname: GNT·4 | Goblin Goliath | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: When CARDNAME enters the battlefield, create a number of 1/1 red Goblin creature tokens equal to the number of opponents you have.
trans-unit.target: When CARDNAME enters the battlefield, create a number of 1/1 red Goblin creature tokens equal to the number of opponents you have.

trans-unit.resname: GNT·4 | Goblin Goliath | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: {3}{R}, {T}: If a source you control would deal damage to an opponent this turn, it deals double that damage to that player instead.
trans-unit.target: {3}{R}, {T}: If a source you control would deal damage to an opponent this turn, it deals double that damage to that player instead.

trans-unit.resname: GNT·5 | Avatar of Growth | Card Name
GNT·5 | Avatar of Growth | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: This spell costs {1} less to cast for each opponent you have.
trans-unit.target: This spell costs {1} less to cast for each opponent you have.

trans-unit.resname: GNT·5 | Avatar of Growth | Card Text | Paragraph 2
GNT·5 | Avatar of Growth | Card Text | Paragraph 3
trans-unit.source: When CARDNAME enters the battlefield, each player searches their library for up to two basic land cards, puts them onto the battlefield, then shuffles.
trans-unit.target: When CARDNAME enters the battlefield, each player searches their library for up to two basic land cards, puts them onto the battlefield, then shuffles.
